forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As another day transitions into evening in Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere carries a stillness that invites reflection, enhanced by the cool, coastal breeze. The sun has dipped beneath the horizon, leaving a trail of lingering warmth—though soon enough, the chill will settle in as temperatures murmur down towards a delightful 54 degrees. The clarity of the twilight sky is refreshing, unmarred by the notorious fog that often cloaks the city. Yet, above the Golden Gate, whispers of the marine layer softly gather, hinting at a night that might cradled in that familiar cool embrace.

With a brisk wind brushing through at 8 to 17 mph, this is a quintessential San Francisco evening. As you step outside, a light sweater or a comfortable jacket should suffice to ward off the evening chill. The urban landscape, illuminated by city lights, beckons an array of activities: perhaps an evening stroll along the Embarcadero, where the city unfurls its beauty against the sparkle of the bay; or a visit to one of the cozy cafés dotting the neighborhood, ideal for sinking into a good book over a cup of steaming coffee. No matter the choice, the charm of the city is apparent tonight; it is a time to indulge in its vibrant heart, embracing the simplicity that this special place uniquely offers.
